keyPolicies.policyDescription: keeping our NHS safe from cuts and privatisation

mentions.candidate: I want to be a strong and credible local MP
mentions.tacticalSituation: The people of Stockton, Yarm, Thornaby, Ingleby Barwick and Eaglescliffe deserve better.

issues.health: keeping our NHS safe from cuts and privatisation

leaflet.personalStatement: My name is Dr Paul Williams and I am the prospective parliamentary candidate for the Labour Party in Stockton South for the upcoming General Election. I want to be a strong and credible local MP - keeping our NHS safe from cuts and privatisation, protecting pensions and supporting local families. I can't just sit by as a local GP watching the NHS fall apart. People are unable to get an appointment with their doctor, waiting lists for surgery are increasing and our local hospital services are under threat of closure. I have a track record of improving services for people in my career as a doctor and health service leader. I would like to be able to represent local people in Stockton in Parliament and to be able to hold this government to account. The people of Stockton, Yarm, Thornaby, Ingleby Barwick and Eaglescliffe deserve better.

contactInformation.address: Printed by Premier Press, Unit 20 Riverside Court, Newcastle upon Tyne NE15 8SG. Promoted by Nigel Cooke on behalf of Dr Paul Williams, both at 7 Queen Anne Terrace, Stockton-on-Tees, TS18 5HS
